software.accesibility
Class AudioPlayer

java.lang.Object
  software.accesibility.AudioPlayer

public class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object

Class for isPlaying audio (WAV) files. Does not work with mp3s. Preliminary tests indicate that the class still performs correctly with a corrupt sound file as far as isPlaying, stopping, duration etc. (the sound will obviously be distorted) Code inspired from : http://forums.sun.com/thread.jspa?threadID=5196428 Provided by: http://forums.sun.com/profile.jspa?userID=938091 With the license:
